templates.description: Support for Mistral API, LM Studio, multiple OCR options.  Integrated deployment to AWS, GCP, Azure, Scaleway using Pulumi.
Dynamic configuration of prompt and agent tools without a system restart

Dynamic configuration of processing flows with the addition of the librarian component, and the flow API.  This is an early release of a major change.  Some of the functionality is only available in APIs and command-line.

platforms.name: podman-compose
platforms.description: Uses podman-compose to deploy a compose file to a local Podman environment

platforms.name: docker-compose
platforms.description: Uses docker-compose to deploy a compose file to a local Docker installation

platforms.name: minikube-k8s
platforms.description: Uses kubectl to deploy resources to a Minikube Kubernetes cluster

platforms.name: scw-k8s
platforms.description: Uses kubectl to deploy resources to a Kubernetes cluster running in Scaleway cloud

platforms.name: gcp-k8s
platforms.description: Uses kubectl to deploy resources to a Kubernetes cluster on Google Cloud (e.g. GKE)

platforms.name: aks-k8s
platforms.description: Uses kubectl to deploy resources to a Kubernetes cluster in Azure (AKS)

platforms.name: eks-k8s
platforms.description: Uses kubectl to deploy resources to an Kubernetes cluster running in AWS (e.g. EKS)
